AUTHOR: Kowlin
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing Buyrole
This cog will allow you to setup a shop where your users can buy/request roles.

For setup instructions please see the GitHub Wiki(<https://github.com/Kowlin/refactored-cogs/wiki>)
For support: <https://support.kowlin.xyz>

If you like my work and want to support me, please consider becoming a Patron over at <https://patreon.com/kowlin>
NAME: Buyrole
SHORT: Allow users to buy roles with Economy
DESCRIPTION: Allow your users to buy roles with Economy credits, this cog will apply and set the roles of users who are buying them.
